item.title: 1 - Scripting kubernetes-the-hard-way
item.description: During preparation for my Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) and Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS) exams I realized the value of having a local Kubernetes cluster that can be used to experiment. Initially, I followed the instructions from kubernetes-the-hard-way by Kelsey Hightower and manually built a local cluster on my Windows 10 laptop.
